PSCT.Base: You can discard 1 "Salamangreat" monster; send 1 "Salamangreat" monster from your Deck to the GY, then draw 1 card. If you control a "Salamangreat" Link Monster that was Link Summoned using a monster with its same name as material: You can discard 1 "Salamangreat" monster; draw 2 cards. You can only use 1 "Salamangreat Gift" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
